query.name: workload.deptids.getlist
query.comments: 多部门Sum查询护理工作量

,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A134,0)),0)as A134 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A135,0)),0)as A135 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A136,0)),0)as A136 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A137,0)),0)as A137 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A138,0)),0)as A138 A148,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A149,0)),0)as A149 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A150,0)),0)as A150,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A151,0)),0)as A151 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A152,0)),0)as A152 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A153,0)),0)as A153,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A154,0)),0)as A154,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A155,0)),0)as A155 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A156,0)),0)as A156 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A157,0)),0)as A157 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A158,0)),0)as A158 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A169,0)),0)as A169 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A170,0)),0)as A170 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A171,0)),0)as A171 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A172,0)),0)as A172 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A173,0)),0)as A173 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A174,0)),0)as A174 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A175,0)),0)as A175 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A176,0)),0)as A176 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A177,0)),0)as A177,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A178,0)),0)as ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A184,0)),0)as A184,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A185,0)),0)as A185 FROM HRWorkloadDeptBase where charindex(convert(nvarchar(50), OwningBusinessUnit),'#{owningBusinessUnit}')>0 AND YearNumber='#{yearNumber}' AND MonthNumber BETWEEN #{month} AND #{endMonth} --group by OwningBusinessUnit ,YearNumber

query.name: nurse.qualitydeptids.getlist
query.sql: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A100,0)),0)as A100 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A101,0)),0)as A101 -- ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A102,0)),0)as A102 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A103,0)),0)as A103 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A104,0)),0)as A104 -- ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A105,0)),0)as A105 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A106,0)),0)as A106 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A107,0)),0)as A107 --,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A108,0)),0)as A108 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A109,0)),0)as A109 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A110,0)),0)as A110 --,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A111,0)),0)as A111 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A112,0)),0)as A112,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A113,0)),0)as A113 --,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A114,0)),0)as A114 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A115,0)),0)as A115 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A116,0)),0)as A116 --,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A117,0)),0)as A117 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A118,0)),0)as A118,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A119,0)),0)as A119 --,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A120,0)),0)as A120 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A121,0)),0)as A121 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A122,0)),0)as A122--,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A123,0)),0)as A123 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A124,0)),0)as A124 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A125,0)),0)as A125 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A126,0)),0)as A126 --,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A127,0)),0)as A127 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A128,0)),0)as A128 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A129,0)),0)as A129--,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A130,0)),0)as A130 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A131,0)),0)as A131 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A132,0)),0)as A132 --,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A133,0)),0)as A133 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A134,0)),0)as A134 ,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A135,0)),0)as A135 --,ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(A136,0)),0)as A136 FROM NurseQualityDeptBase where charindex(convert(nvarchar(50), OwningBusinessUnit),'#{owningBusinessUnit}')>0 AND YearNumber='#{yearNumber}' AND MonthNumber BETWEEN #{month} AND #{endMonth} --group by OwningBusinessUnit ,YearNumber
